mapper.select: select courseID, s.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, coursePeopleMax, courseFee, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseStart, courseEnd, courseState from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID order by courseID desc

select courseID, c.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, courseRoomNumber, courseStart, courseEnd, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseTime, courseFee, coursePeopleMax, courseState, syllabusOutline, syllabusPurpose, syllabusTarget, syllabusContent from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID where courseID = #{courseID}

select courseID, s.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, coursePeopleMax, courseFee, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseStart, courseEnd, courseState, to_char(courseApplyEnd - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) as dday from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID where courseApplyStart <= sysdate and sysdate <= courseStart order by dday desc

select courseID, c.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, courseRoomNumber, courseStart, courseEnd, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseTime, courseFee, coursePeopleMax, courseState, syllabusOutline, syllabusPurpose, syllabusTarget, syllabusContent from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID where courseID = #{courseID}
mapper.insert: insert into course (courseid, syllabusid, coursestart, courseend, courseapplystart, courseapplyend, coursetime, coursefee, courseroomnumber, coursepeoplemax) values(course_seq.NEXTVAL, #{syllabusID}, TO_DATE(#{courseStart}, 'YY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{courseEnd}, 'YY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{courseApplyStart}, 'YY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{courseApplyEnd}, 'YY-MM-DD'),#{courseTime},#{courseFee},#{courseRoomNumber},#{coursePeopleMax})
mapper.update: update course set courseState='조기마감' where courseid = #{courseID}
update course set courseState='접수중' where courseid = #{courseID}
update course set coursepeopleapplied = coursepeopleapplied+1 where courseid=#{courseID}
update course set coursestate = '마감' where (courseid in (select courseid from course where courseapplyend < sysdate)) and coursestate='접수중'
